page.title: 17COLLEGE HILL PLAY GROUP
page.content: This is open in school term time from Monday to Friday 9.00am till 12.00pm.There are 35 children altogether at the moment and 5 helpers.The minimum starting age is two nine months and they come for two days a week to begin with.Some mothers stay and help with playgroup.The children come from the surrounding College Estate.They visit farms sometimes in the winter and spring and in the summer have a day out at the sea side.At the playgroup the children enjoy meeting and playing with one another.Among other things they paint,play singing games,learn rhymes and songs and do some cooking.They also have bikes,prams,a wendy house,a sandpit,lego and puzzles.
